name: Emily's Adventure (itch) (EmilysAdventure)
description:
Dear Friends,

The corona virus has us tight up at home. Within this time we spent a lot of time with family. I tried to make a game for my daughter and she is the main character.

The game is not completed yet but the first level and concept for 2 later levels are included. I would love to get some feedback! ^^

Cheers,

Bastian

Music Credits:

A World of Possibilities · Jon Björk

Journey in the New World - by Twin Musicom

"resonance" by airtone
